camera_gear.model: Sony A7R V or Phase One IQ4 150MP
camera_gear.lens: Canon TS-E 24mm f/3.5L II (adapted) or Sony FE 24-70mm GM II (at 35mm)
camera_gear.sensor: Full Frame 61MP BSI CMOS or Medium Format
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/10 sec to 1/15 sec (slow shutter to create motion blur on passing vehicles)
camera_gear.aperture: f/11 (to ensure edge-to-edge sharpness and create sunstar effect on specular highlights)

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Golden Hour (Late Afternoon, approx. 1 hour before sunset)
lighting_setup.weather: Sunny with scattered clouds, clear visibility
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Direct Western Backlight/Sidelight (Contre-jour), creating a massive specular reflection on the building facade
lighting_setup.quality: Sky Gradient: A smooth diagonal gradient from Steel Blue (#4682B4) in the top-left zenith fading into a hazy Pale Cyan (#E0FFFF) towards the horizon. High-contrast directional light mixed with soft cool ambient fill in shadows
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Mixed color temperature: 2700K sodium vapor street lighting, 4000K LED building illumination, 5600K neutral signage backlights

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Minimal visibility, overpowered by the exterior reflection
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Blinding sunburst reflection on the glass. Color codes: Solar Glint #FFF8E1 (Pale Gold) transitioning to #FFAE00 (Vivid Orange) and #D35400 (Pumpkin) on the glass mullions.

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Color codes: #2C3E50 (Dark Slate Blue) and #34495E (Cool Grey) reflecting the zenith sky, contrasting with the warm building.
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Sun-drenched tree canopies, Deep shadows beneath trees, White lane markings

color_grading.palette: Strong Complementary Contrast: Burning Gold/Orange (#FF8C00) highlights vs. Cool Slate Blue/Cyan (#2E4053) shadows
color_grading.saturation: High saturation in the orange spectrum, desaturated cool tones in the shadows
color_grading.contrast: High Dynamic Range (HDR) look, preserving details in the blinding highlight while maintaining deep blacks in the foreground cars

texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Highly reflective glazing acting as a mirror, matte asphalt absorbing light
texture_quality.ground_surface: Asphalt texture visible but softened by motion blur and shadow, cool blue cast

atmosphere.mood: Energetic, dynamic, blindingly bright yet urbanely cool
atmosphere.feeling: The rush of the city at the end of the workday, modern efficiency, architectural brilliance

technical_quality.post_processing: Highlight compression to retain sunburst detail, cool toning in shadows (Split Toning), motion blur enhancement
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight (5600K) adjusted to let shadows drift blue while highlights remain intensely warm
technical_quality.tone: High contrast S-Curve, crushed blacks in the car undercarriages
technical_quality.vignette: Subtle darkening at the bottom corners to frame the road
technical_quality.dynamic_range: 14 stops, critical retention of highlight data in the sun reflection
